raw_body:
CHARLES TISSERA – (Former Marketing Manager at Associated Newspapers of Ceylon Limited – Lake House): Husband of late Bridget Tissera,​ father of Dr. Anusha Withanachchi and Duminda Tissera,​ father-in-law of Dr. Kanthaka Withanachchi and Ayesha Tissera,​ grandfather of Maleesha,​ Chenaya and Evan,​ expired. Remains lie at residence 60/​3,​ Kirimetiyagara,​ Kadawatha. Cortege leaves residence at 4.00 pm on Wednesday 17th January for burial at St. Anthony’s Roman Catholic Cemetery,​ Kirimetiyagara.
004022
